com.bitplan.mediawiki.japi

Interface MediawikiApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mediawiki, Mediawiki

    public interface MediawikiApi
    Mediawiki API Interface see https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API:Main_page
    Author:
    wf

    • Method Summary

      • edit

        Edit edit(String pagetitle,
        String text,
        String summary)
          throws Exception
        Edits a page by setting its text to the supplied value.
        Parameters:
        text - the text of the page
        pagetitle - the title of the page
        summary - the edit summary. Summaries longer than 200 characters are truncated server-side.
        Returns:
        the edit stage as a wrapped Edit API response
        Throws:
        Exception - - if the edit fails
        See Also:
        getPageContent(java.lang.String)

      • isThrowExceptionOnError

        set to true if exceptions should be thrown when api error codes are received default is true
        Parameters:
        throwExceptionOnError - the throwExceptionOnError to set
